examples.advanced: 공항버스은/는 도시 교통의 중요한 수단입니다.
examples.master: 공항버스 시스템의 발전은 도시 인프라 현대화를 보여줍니다.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.translation: I take the airport bus / limousine bus.

en.explanation: A bus that goes to and from the airport.

examples.beginner: I take the airport bus / limousine bus.
examples.intermediate: I commute by airport bus / limousine bus.
examples.advanced: airport bus / limousine bus is an important means of urban transportation.
examples.master: The development of airport bus / limousine bus systems shows urban infrastructure modernization.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: I take the airport bus / limousine bus.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.translation: I take the ktx (korea train express).

en.explanation: Korea's high-speed train.

examples.intermediate: I commute by ktx (korea train express).
examples.advanced: KTX (Korea Train Express) is an important means of urban transportation.
examples.master: The development of ktx (korea train express) systems shows urban infrastructure modernization.

dialogue.translation: I take the ride-hailing app / taxi app.
